data.captioning: No acute cardiopulmonary findings.Heart size within normal limits. No focal airspace disease. No pneumothorax or effusion. Mild degenerative change in the thoracic spine.

Right upper lobe cavity, consistent with prior tuberculous infection. There is increased right upper lobe opacities XXXX compared to the prior study. Thoracic spine demonstrates mild degenerative changes with some mild XXXX loss of T and T vertebral bodies.
